itemDescription: British journalist, newspaper columnist and political activist

wikipedia_page.main: Mark Edwin Wallace (born 20 August 1984) is a British journalist, newspaper columnist and political activist. He is Chief Executive of the website ConservativeHome, and is a former Campaign Director of the TaxPayers' Alliance.

link_mentions.page: Royal Grammar School, Newcastle upon Tyne

response: In February 2013, Montgomerie announced that he would leave the site in April of the same year to become comment editor of The Times. Goodman succeeded him as editor, and Mark Wallace joined the site as executive editor in May 2013.
Mark Wallace is an American businessman, former diplomat and lawyer.
Mark Wallace may also refer to:
*Mark Wallace (community leader) (1893–1984), New Zealand cheesemaker, farmer, community leader and local politician
